resources.string: Open any MIDI- or Karaoke-file or any other audio-file (such as MP3, WAV, etc.)
The program will automatically transcribe audio and save as a MIDI-file
However, no instrument information is extracted, and all transcribed notes get combined into one part
The accuracy depends on the complexity of the song, and is obviously higher for solo piano pieces. Accuracy for piano pieces is around 75%.
Select tracks. Percussion-tracks (like “Drums”, “Rhythms”, “Hit”, “Blow”, “Strike”, “Clash”, etc.) will be disabled.
If you want to go forward or backwards chord-by-chord, you can use scroll-bar left or right button
Or if you want just to play the song in real time, press “Play” button
